name: @abstractplay/gameslib
description: TypeScript implementations of the core Abstract Play games, intended to be wrapped by the front- and backends

scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run tslint
scripts.full-dev: npm run test && npm run build && npm run dist-dev
scripts.full-prod: npm run test && npm run build && npm run dist-prod
scripts.quick: npm run build-ts && npm run dist-dev && npm run distribute
scripts.json2ts: npx json2ts -i src/schemas/gameinfo.json -o src/schemas/gameinfo.d.ts && npx json2ts -i src/schemas/moveresults.json -o src/schemas/moveresults.d.ts

author: Aaron Dalton <aaron@daltons.ca> (https://www.perlkonig.com/)
